entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
